thread.title: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals
thread.title_full: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals

author: wtopstaff
title: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals
text:
Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals By JUSTIN BERGMAN October 16, 2015 6:13 am Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France celebrates after winning his quarterfinal match against Kevin Anderson of South Africa in the Shanghai Masters tennis tournament in Shanghai, China, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. (AP Photo/Andy Wong) 
SHANGHAI (AP) — Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year by defeating Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 Friday to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters. 
The fourth-seeded Wawrinka missed wildly on his groundstrokes throughout the match, finishing with 34 unforced errors. He was coming off a tough three-set victory over Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals that finished close to midnight the night before. 
Nadal hadn’t won against a top-five player since last year’s French Open final when he defeated No. 2 Novak Djokovic for his 14th Grand Slam title. 
Nadal will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the semifinals on Saturday after the French player topped Kevin Anderson of South Africa 7-6 (6), 5-7, 6-4. Topics:
